data.title: Monstrous Movie Music soundtracks
data.text:
AUDIO SAMPLES (mp3)

(While our CD re-recordings are in fabulous, state-of-the-art stereo sound and our original soundtrack releases newly remastered, for this site we are using a lower-quality sampling rate to facilitate internet transmission.)

More audio samples are on our CATALOG page.
